title: Centrally Located Yangzhou Stay with Soothing Grand Canal Views
description: Amid serene views of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Grand Canal and glimmering city lights, the Crowne Plaza Yangzhou, an IHG Hotel, offers a refined stay in the heart of the gleaming Guangling district. Peruse local markets of jade and papercraft and enjoy resplendent vistas of Slender West Lake. When you return, afternoon tea or a cheeky dessert await at the Canal Lounge, before you move on to savour curated plates of traditional Huaiyang cuisine at Ju Studio.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Yangzhou, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.3 East Wenchang Road, Guangling District, Yangzhou, 225006 Mainland China
